pullrequest.title: Reset desired arm location and joint reference commands when Reset is called

content.raw: @jacquelinekay and I tested this, and while it seems to work in benign situations, it doesn't recover from the case where the arm has been reduced to NaNs.  Is it possible to recover from that case?
content.html: @jacquelinekay and I tested this, and while it seems to work in benign situations, it doesn't recover from the case where the arm has been reduced to NaNs. Is it possible to recover from that case?
